user_query: I'm in need of some fresh and popular memes to share with my friends. Can you provide me with the newest trending memes from various subreddits?

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of popular subreddits related to memes.
Retrieve the latest memes from the selected popular meme subreddits.
Filter the fetched memes to ensure they are up-to-date and entertaining.
Compile the final list of trending memes for sharing.
